# Call

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/Call" symbolName="Call" /> Call

A standard LLM call implementation.

This class implements the BaseCall interface for synchronous and
asynchronous LLM interactions. It supports both regular responses
and streaming responses.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "BaseCall[P, Response]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "BaseCall", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "doc_url": "/docs/mirascope/api/calls/BaseCall#basecall"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "P", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "doc_identifier": "P"}, {"type_str": "Response", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "doc_url": "/docs/mirascope/api/calls/index#response"}]}} />
